==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The shop may be named after {{W|Madame Eloffe|Adélaïde Henriette Damoville}}, better known as ''Madame Eloffe'', a French fashion merchant who sold finery to Queen {{W|Marie Antoinette}} and her ladies-in-waiting at the royal court.
